lessons.title: Files and directories
lessons.content: Learn basic navigation: ls, cd, pwd. Files live in a tree. Use ls -la to see permissions and ownership.

lessons.title: Pipes and redirects
lessons.content: stdin, stdout, stderr. Use | to chain commands. Use > and >> to redirect output to files.

lessons.title: What is a container?
lessons.content: Containers package an app and its dependencies. They share the host kernel but have isolated filesystem and process space.

lessons.title: Docker basics
lessons.content: docker run, docker build, Dockerfile. Images are layers; containers are running instances of an image.
